knimeNode.name: Strint To URI
knimeNode.shortDescription: Convert string columns into URI columns.

fullDescription.intro: This node converts the selected string columns into columns of the type URI.
fullDescription.option: Columns that will be converted. They have to contain a string with the correct URI syntax.

ports.inPort: Table that contains one or more string columns with uri information.
ports.outPort: Input table with the selected columns replaced by there corresponding URI column.
